t: Stanley Black & Decker Acquires MTD (Cub Cadet, Troy-Bilt)
s: In addition to Dewalt’s 20V Max and FlexVolt cordless offerings, Stanley Black & Decker also has a growing catalog of lawn & garden tools under their Craftsman brand. According to their announcement to investors, MTD earned $2.5 billion in revenue in the last 12 months.
